title: How to Make Cajun Spice Blend

steps.headline: Add the whole spices to a mortar and pestle.
Add the cayenne, paprika and celery salt.
Transfer to an airtight container for storage.
steps.description: Use according to the recipe's requirements.

steps.headline: Add the paprika, parsley, garlic, oregano, thyme and cayenne pepper to a mixing bowl.
Transfer to a serving dish or use as required.
steps.description: If storing, keep in airtight container.

tyn: Mixing implement (for example, a wooden spoon)
text: Cajun spice blend 1 Add the whole spices to a mortar and pestle. Grind the spices coarsely. Add the cayenne, paprika and celery salt. Mix well. Transfer to an airtight container for storage. Use according to the recipe's requirements. Cajun spice blend 2 Add the paprika, parsley, garlic, oregano, thyme and cayenne pepper to a mixing bowl. Add salt to taste. Mix well.  Transfer to a serving dish or use as required. If storing, keep in airtight container.
sentences: Cajun spice blend 1 Add the whole spices to a mortar and pestle.
Add the cayenne, paprika and celery salt.
Transfer to an airtight container for storage.
Use according to the recipe's requirements.
Cajun spice blend 2 Add the paprika, parsley, garlic, oregano, thyme and cayenne pepper to a mixing bowl.
Transfer to a serving dish or use as required.
If storing, keep in airtight container.
